name: StopWindowsService
description: Stop a Windows Service that is running on the same machine as the agent.
author: douglasquintanilha
helpMarkDown: Stop a Windows Service that is running on the same machine as the agent.

inputs.name: ServiceName
inputs.label: Service Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the service that will be stopped.

inputs.name: Timeout
inputs.label: Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: How many seconds the task should wait after sending the stop command.

inputs.name: SkipWhenServiceDoesNotExists
inputs.label: Skip task if the service does not exist.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to skip this task if the service does not exist on the machine. It's useful to leave this on for the first deploy.

inputs.name: KillService
inputs.label: Kill service if stop fails
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option for force terminate the service if the stop fails.
